about_the_game:
Amidst the vastness of space, cries for help can be easily unheard, and dangers lurk in every corner. You play as an astronaut in search of parts to repair your ship and stumble upon an abandoned space station. Explore the decrepit station, brave its terrors, unravel its mysteries, and secure the necessary components to save yourself.

Explore


Navigate the dark, and discover new items across the space station that can be used to enhance your exploration, or perhaps repair your ship. Use every resource available to progress further and discover more.

Fight for your Survival


In the cramped spaces of an abandoned space station fight off the monsters that lurk in the dark. Don't spend all your bullets at once, every shot is one less for your next fight.

May the light guide you


Enemies are sensitive to light, utilize the power of flares and light to combat your enemies, and hold back the encroaching darkness. Venture forth and prepare to face the countless enemies of this dark space station and discover its hidden secrets.

content_descriptors.notes: Alien Creatures and fantasy combat violence are included throughout the game. Attacking/damaging enemies or taking damage has no real detail outside of a camera shake.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or M1 equivalent

name: Station Obscurum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Venture into the Station. Navigate through its dark halls and decrepit rooms. Confront the monsters that lurk in the dark and discover the many mysteries contained in this ancient space station. Find what you need to repair your ship and escape. Your life depends on it!
